scene.name: intro
scene.line: Wow, check this stuff out. It must be decades old, but it's in perfect condition.
scene.option: How do you think they keep it like that?

scene.name: maintenance
scene.line: Maintenance, old man. I bet it's someone's job around here. Probably hard to keep all the dust out — you know, underground.

scene.name: like-electronics
scene.line: Yeah, I've got it bad. Ha ha.

scene.name: shannon-work
scene.line: That's why I got into this business — to keep old stuff like this running. Seems like such a shame to let it just fall into ruin, you know? Like that computer back in the cave. `XANADU`.
Decades of engineering, thousands of years of mathematics and philosophy, all petrified into living stone. How could you just let that fall apart?
